arts.ttl: Transfer Talk: Barca consider De Jong exit in summer 2025
arts.sum: Barcelona could let Frenkie de Jong leave in the summer to avoid losing the midfielder leave on a free transfer when his contract ends in 2026, reports Diario Sport . Liverpool, Arsenal, Benfica and Real Madrid are also said to be monitoring the 18-year-old Brazil youth international who has made 15 first-team appearances for Palmeiras.

arts.ttl: Three talking points from Alaves 0-3 Barcelona
arts.sum: Hansi Flick plays an incredibly high line but the players are well drilled and it worked well against Alaves as Barca kept just a fourth clean sheet of the season in La Liga. Flick insisted he was the best in the business after the game: “That’s how we’ve known him since I was with him at Bayern and he’s still the same.

arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer news: Mikel Arteta 'green lights' move for Barcelona 18-year-old
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta reportedly gives the thumbs-up to the Gunners making a move for 18-year-old Barcelona attacking prodigy Arnau Pradas.

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal & Hansi Flick the latest Barcelona pair to reach out to Dani Carvajal
arts.sum: Another two members of the first-team setup at La Liga giants Barcelona have on Sunday forwarded messages of support to Real Madrid star Dani Carvajal. This of course comes after…

arts.ttl: Flick hails his ‘fantastic’ forwards - Lewandowski, Raphinha and Yamal
arts.sum: He’s a very dynamic footballer, who can still be even better,” he said. The German boss went on to praise Lewandowski after he took his tally to 12 for the season.

arts.ttl: First-half hat trick for Lewandowski as Barcelona top ahead of international break
arts.sum: Robert Lewandowski continued his impressive start to the season on Sunday, scoring a 25-minute hat trick as Barcelona beat Alaves 3-0 and went into the international break top of the Spanish league. Lewandowski scored in the seventh, 22nd and 32nd minutes to take his league tally to 10 goals in nine matches.

arts.ttl: Alaves 0-3 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Lewandowski stars
arts.sum: Robert Lewandowski scores a hat-trick inside 32 minutes to fire Barcelona to a commanding 3-0 victory over Alaves at Mendizorroza.

arts.ttl: Robert Lewandowski stars as Barcelona restore three-point advantage with victory at Alaves
arts.sum: Barcelona have responded to Real Madrid’s victory against Villarreal on Saturday with a win of their own. The Catalans had the match won in the first match, eventually securing a 3-0 victory at Alaves. Robert Lewandowski was the main man for Barcelona, as he netted a hat-trick. His first came in the opening seven minutes, […] The post Robert Lewandowski stars as Barcelona restore three-point advantage with victory at Alaves appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: WATCH: Robert Lewandowski continues fine form as Barcelona take early lead against Alaves
arts.sum: Real Madrid’s victory over Villarreal on Saturday has meant that Barcelona’s lead at the top of La Liga has been wiped out. Hansi Flick’s side have the chance to re-establish their three-point lead with a win at Alaves, and so far, they are on course to achieve that after scoring an early opening goal. arts.ttl: Barcelona predicted XI vs Alaves: no debut for Wojciech Szczesny
arts.sum: Barcelona have travelled to Vitoria to face Deportivo Alaves in La Liga action on Sunday afternoon off the back of a 5-0 midweek win against Young Boys in the Champions…
